name: Ground Beef with Cheese
description: Indulge in a healthy twist on comfort food with our Ground Beef with Cheese recipe. Rich in protein and fiber, this low-carb dish is perfect for those seeking a nutritious yet satisfying meal. Featuring succulent ground beef, creamy cheese spread, and a touch of lemon for zest, it's a high-fiber, high-protein choice that doesn't skimp on flavor. Perfect for anyone on a health-conscious journey without sacrificing taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the cauliflower under cold water and chop it into small florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to a boil and blanch the cauliflower florets for about 5 minutes until tender. Drain well.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the blanched cauliflower, cream cheese spread, salt, black pepper, lemon juice, butter, and milk. Mash the ingredients together until smooth, for approximately 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until browned and no longer pink, about 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the cooked ground beef into a baking dish as the first layer. Top it with the cauliflower and cheese mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the cherry tomatoes and arrange them on top of the cauliflower mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, until the top is golden and bubbly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
